tool.name: vvv2_display: Display SNP proportions and CDS of an assembly in png image
tool.help:
[vvv2_display.py] Aim: Display of SNP proportions, annotations, for an assembly in: - vardict variant calling output - vadr assembly annotations out: - png file (image of SNP proportion alongside the assembly with CDS positions) - txt file with variant calling summary, location in CDS and surround DNA sequence.
usage: vvv2_display.py [-h] [-p FILE] [-f FILE] [-s FILE] [-n FILE] [-r FILE]
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -p FILE, --pass_tbl_f FILE in: tabular file of vadr annotations, with pass status -f FILE, --fail_tbl_f FILE in: tabular file of vadr annotations, with fail status -s FILE, --seq_stat_f FILE in: seq stat file of vadr annotator -n FILE, --vcf_f FILE in: vcf variant file provided by vardict -r FILE, --png_var_f FILE out: png file with variant proportions and annotations
